events.title: Townhall with the CEO
events.description: In this live Q-and-A session the CEO of Toaster Inc. will take questions sent in beforehand to townhall@toastergroup.com or questions submitted live during the event.

events.title: Chat and Coffee
events.description: Join this 30-minute chat to share something meaningful that happened in your live over the weekend, it can be a child's graduation, a new pet or anything you draw inspiration from for the week.

events.title: Technology and Data
events.description: Marissa from Network Ops shares with you best practices to improve your Excel skills, organize your tasks, collect your teams ideas and better manage your day.

events.title: Leadership and Ideation
events.description: John Munro explains how Toaster Inc's culture has earned it's reputation for being mindful of new ideas, and continously improve production and development structures.

events.title: We're not selling Toasters
events.description: ...but we're selling a breakfast experience. At this rountable, you can learn from Katie why this profound change in thinking creates products without competition.

events.title: Lunchtime Vinyasa Yoga
events.description: Unwind for a moment and strengthen your flow with Courtney's smooth and fluid Asanas that you can follow from your own living room or from the office.

events.title: Make the perfect toast
events.description: Product developer Henry teaches you how to make the perfect breakfast slice and why Toster Inc's patented roast dial took six years of development.

events.title: Toaster Inc. healthcare benefits
events.description: Peter Harrison, HR director, explains how to access all your health plan benefits, minimize your families' co-payments and answers your questions.

events.title: How we brought electric tea kettles to the US
events.description: Long a stable in British kitchens, the US has shunned tea kettles in lieu of microwaving their water. How did Toaster Inc's culture singlehandedly change the nation?
